Title: Establishes a cause of action for fertility fraud
Summary: Establishes a cause of action for fertility fraud, allows patients who have undergone assisted reproduction procedures to bring a cause of action if human reproductive material other than that which was consented to by the patient is used in such procedure; allows for compensatory and punitive damages.
LawCode: Add ยง52-d, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to establishing a cause of action for fertility fraud
